name: Beaker Bro
description:
With your scientist friend out of the house, it's time to get to work on making him a love potion.  Find and mix the right colored liquids and feed the machine until you have all 6 colors.

It is a time-based platformer that will likely take at least 2 attempts to beat as you learn the route.  The game is goofy and light-hearted and we hope you enjoy.

This game was entered into the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.  It may receive some small updates once the Jam judging period is over.   We greatly welcome any feedback from players and any likes to get the game more attention.

The theme of the GMTK Game Jam was Joined Together.  We fit this theme through the mechanic to joining with liquid (and merging certain color combinations together) and through the theme of the game, Finding Love.
